data.name: Blackjack Avenue Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Blackjack Avenue soundtrack boasts 15 tracks of Electronic Music.

The album is 36 minutes of tracks that will be great for your personal audio collection.

Listen to the Blackjack Avenue Soundtrack on the go with the 320kbps MP3's.

Or enjoy the HD FLAC files for your personal collection.

Both the MP3 and FLAC files are included in this soundtrack!

data.short_description: The Blackjack Avenue Soundtrack is a 15 track journey through several soundscapes. Listen to the Blackjack Avenue Soundtrack on the go with the 320kbps MP3's. Or enjoy the HD FLAC files for your personal collection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 400 MB available space
